short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Everywhere Browser Extension provides seamless access to Collibra metadata from within Tableau and other web apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Collibra Everywhere Browser Extension provides context to users and a deeper understanding of data and business assets.
